Sentencas: The design of a cathode inter-layer is important to the high performance of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Combined micro-scale and macro-scale modeling of the composite electrode of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this paper, the processes of electrochemical reactions, electronic and ionic conductions and gas transports in an SOFC are discussed in detail.
Titulo: Combined micro-scale and macro-scale modeling of the composite electrode of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: An analysis shows that the current conduction and electrochemical processes can be replicated by an equivalent circuit model.
Titulo: Combined micro-scale and macro-scale modeling of the composite electrode of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A corresponding macro-scale model using the Butler-Volmer equation for electrochemical reactions, Ohm's law for current conduction and the Dusty-gas model for gas transport is described.
Titulo: Combined micro-scale and macro-scale modeling of the composite electrode of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A percolation theory based micro-model is used to obtain the effective electrode properties in the macro-model from the microstructure parameters of the porous electrode.
Titulo: Combined micro-scale and macro-scale modeling of the composite electrode of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Experimental I-V relations can be accurately accounted for by the proposed theory.
Titulo: Combined micro-scale and macro-scale modeling of the composite electrode of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The macro- and micro-models are then combined to systematically examine the effects of various parameters on the performance of a composite cathode inter-layer.
Titulo: Combined micro-scale and macro-scale modeling of the composite electrode of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The examined parameters include the thickness, effective electronic and ionic conductivities, exchange current density, operating temperature, output current density, electrode- and electrolyte-particle radii, composition and porosity of the cathode inter-layer.
Titulo: Combined micro-scale and macro-scale modeling of the composite electrode of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The comprehensive study shows conclusively that a cathode inter-layer thickness in a range of 10-20 mu m is optimal for all practical material choices and microstructure designs.
Titulo: Combined micro-scale and macro-scale modeling of the composite electrode of a solid oxide fuel cell
